title: How the USGS detects earthquakes using Twitter
text:
12 How the USGS detects earthquakes using Twitter 
Nextgov: The world is covered in sensors. Thermometers, barometers, seismometers. When joined together, they have incredible capabilities: Through its global network of seismographs, the United States Geological Service detects earthquakes as they happen, estimates their reach and destruction, and can even warn civilian authorities of what might be on the way.
